name: text
description: add text to tags

name: comment
description: add an html comment

name: !DOCTYPE
description: Defines that the document type is html

name: a
description: Creates a link to a URL: a web page, a section within a page, an email address... Also called the anchor element, where the a comes from.

name: abbr
description: Defines an abbreviation, and usually includes its full description.

name: address
description: Defines a block for contact information.

name: area
description: Defines an area in an image map

name: article
description: Defines an article

name: aside
description: Describes contain set(or write) on aside place in page contain

name: audio
description: Specific audio content

name: b
description: Specific text weight bold

name: base
description: The base element allows authors to specify the document base URL.

name: bdo
description: Specific direction of text display

name: blockquote
description: Specifies a long quotation

name: body
description: Defines a main section(body) part in HTML document

name: br
description: Specific a single line break

name: button
description: Specifies a press/push button

name: canvas
description: Specifies the display graphics on HTML web documment

name: caption
description: Define a table caption

name: cite
description: Specifies a text citation

name: code
description: Specifies computer code text

name: col
description: Specifies a each column within a colgroup element in table

name: colgroup
description: Defines a group of one or more columns inside table

name: command
description: Define a command button, invoke as per user action

name: datalist
description: Define a list of pre-defined options surrounding input tag

name: dd
description: Defines a definition description in a definition list

name: del
description: Specific text deleted in web document

name: details
description: Define a additional details hide or show as per user action

name: dfn
description: Define a definition team

name: div
description: Define a division part

name: dl
description: Define a definition list

name: dt
description: Define a definition team

name: em
description: Define a text is emphasize format

name: embed
description: Define a embedding external application using a relative plug-in

name: fieldset
description: Defines a grouping of related form elements

name: figcaption
description: Represents a caption text corresponding with a figure element

name: figure
description: Represents self-contained content corresponding with a figcaption element

name: footer
description: Defines a footer section containing details about the author, copyright, contact us, sitemap, or links to related documents.

name: form
description: Defines a form section that having interactive input controls to submit form information to a server.

name: h1
description: Defines a Headings level from 1 to 6 different sizes.

name: head
description: The head element represents a collection of metadata for the Document.

name: header
description: Defines as a container that hold introductory content or navigation links.

name: hr
description: Represent a thematic break between paragraph-level tags. It is typically draw horizontal line.

name: html
description: The html element represents the root of an HTML document

name: i
description: Defines a italic format text

name: iframe
description: Defines a inline frame that embedded external content into current web document.

name: img
description: Used to insert image into a web document.

name: input
description: Define a get information in selected input

name: ins
description: Used to indicate text that is inserted into a page and indicates changes to a document.

name: kbd
description: Used to identify text that are represents keyboard input.

name: label
description: Used to caption a text label with a form input element.

name: legend
description: Used to add a caption (title) to a group of related form elements that are grouped together into the fieldset tag.

name: li
description: Define a list item either ordered list or unordered list.

name: link
description: Used to load an external stylesheets into HTML document.

name: map
description: Defines an clickable image map.

name: mark
description: Used to highlighted (marked) specific text.

name: menu
description: Used to display a unordered list of items/menu of commands.

name: meta
description: Used to provide structured metadata about a web page.

name: meter
description: Used to measure data within a given range.

name: nav
description: Used to defines group of navigation links.

name: noscript
description: Used to provide an fall-back content to the browser that does not support the JavaScript.

name: object
description: Used to embedded objects such as images, audio, videos, Java applets, and Flash animations.

name: ol
description: Defines an ordered list of items.

name: optgroup
description: Used to create a grouping of options, the related options are grouped under specific headings.

name: option
description: Represents option items within a select, optgroup or datalist element.

name: output
description: Used for representing the result of a calculation.

name: p
description: Used to represents a paragraph text.

name: param
description: Provides parameters for embedded object element.

name: pre
description: Used to represents preformatted text.

name: progress
description: Represents the progress of a task.

name: q
description: Represents the short quotation.

name: rp
description: Used to provide parentheses around fall-back content to the browser that does not support the ruby annotations.

name: rt
description: Specifies the ruby text of ruby annotation.

name: ruby
description: Used to represents a ruby annotation.

name: s
description: Text display in strikethrough style.

name: samp
description: Represents text that should be interpreted as sample output from a computer program.

name: script
description: Defines client-side JavaScript.

name: section
description: Used to divide a document into number of different generic section.

name: select
description: Used to create a drop-down list.

name: small
description: Used to makes the text one size smaller.

name: source
description: Used to specifies multiple media resources.

name: span
description: Used to grouping and applying styles to inline elements.

name: strong
description: Represents strong emphasis greater important text.

name: style
description: Used to add CSS style to an HTML document.

name: sub
description: Represents inline subscript text.

name: sup
description: Represents inline superscript text.

name: table
description: Used to defines a table in an HTML document.

name: tbody
description: Used for grouping table rows.

name: td
description: Used for creates standard data cell in HTML table.

name: textarea
description: Create multi-line text input.

name: tfoot
description: Used to adding a footer to a table that containing summary of the table data.

name: th
description: Used for creates header of a group of cell in HTML table.

name: thead
description: Used to adding a header to a table that containing header information of the table.

name: time
description: Represents the date and/or time in an HTML document.

name: page title
description: The title element represents the document’s title or name

name: tr
description: Defines a row of cells in a table.

name: track
description: Represents text tracks for both the audio and video tags.

name: u
description: Represents underlined text.

name: ul
description: Defines an unordered list of items.

name: var
description: Represents a variable in a computer program or mathematical equation.

name: video
description: Used to embed video content.

name: wbr
description: Defines a word break opportunity in a long string of text.

name: accept
description: Sets what types of files that the server accepts (only for type="file")

name: accept-charset
description: Sets the character encodings that are to be used for the form submission

name: accesskey
description: Sets a shortcut key to activate/focus an element

name: action
description: Sets where to send the form-data when the form is submitted

name: alt
description: Sets an alternate text when the original element fails to display

name: async
description: Sets that the script is executed asynchronously (only for external scripts)

name: autocomplete
description: Sets whether the form or the input element should have autocomplete enabled

name: autofocus
description: Sets that the element should automatically get focus when the page loads

name: autoplay
description: Sets that the audio/video will start playing as soon as it is ready

name: charset
description: Sets the character encoding

name: checked
description: Sets that an input element should be pre-selected when the page loads (for type="checkbox" or type="radio")

name: cite
description: Sets a URL which explains the quote/deleted/inserted text

name: class
description: Sets one or more classnames for an element (refers to a class in a style sheet)

name: cols
description: Sets the visible width of a text area

name: colspan
description: Sets the number of columns a table cell should span

name: content
description: Gives the value associated with the http-equiv or name attribute

name: contenteditable
description: Sets whether the content of an element is editable or not

name: contextmenu
description: Sets a context menu for an element. The context menu appears when a user right-clicks on the element

name: controls
description: Sets that audio/video controls should be displayed (such as a play/pause button etc)

name: coords
description: Sets the coordinates of the area

name: data
description: Sets the URL of the resource to be used by the object

name: data-*
description: Used to store metadata data private to the page or application

name: datetime
description: Sets the date and time

name: default
description: Sets that the track is to be enabled if the users preferences do not indicate that another track would be more appropriate

name: defer
description: Sets that the script is executed when the page has finished parsing (only for external scripts)

name: dir
description: Sets the text direction for the content in an element

name: dirname
description: Sets that the text direction will be submitted

name: disabled
description: Sets that the specified element/group of elements should be disabled

name: download
description: Sets that the target will be downloaded when a user clicks on the hyperlink

name: draggable
description: Sets whether an element is draggable or not

name: dropzone
description: Sets whether the dragged data is copied moved or linked when dropped

name: enctype
description: Sets how the form-data should be encoded when submitting it to the server (only for method="post")

name: for
description: Sets which form element(s) a label/calculation is bound to

name: form
description: Sets the name of the form the element belongs to

name: formaction
description: Sets where to send the form-data when a form is submitted. Only for type="submit"

name: headers
description: Sets one or more headers cells a cell is related to

name: height
description: Sets the height of the element

name: hidden
description: Sets that an element is not yet or is no longer relevant

name: high
description: Sets the range that is considered to be a high value

name: href
description: Sets the URL of the page the link goes to

name: hreflang
description: Sets the language of the linked document

name: http-equiv
description: Provides an HTTP header for the information/value of the content attribute

name: id
description: Sets a unique id for an element

name: ismap
description: Sets an image as a server-side image-map

name: kind
description: Sets the kind of text track

name: label
description: Sets the title of the text track

name: lang
description: Sets the language of the elements content

name: list
description: Refers to a datalist element that contains pre-defined options for an input element

name: loop
description: Sets that the audio/video will start over again every time it is finished

name: low
description: Sets the range that is considered to be a low value

name: max
description: Sets the maximum value

name: maxlength
description: Sets the maximum number of characters allowed in an element

name: media
description: Sets what media/device the linked document is optimized for

name: method
description: Sets the HTTP method to use when sending form-data

name: min
description: Sets a minimum value

name: multiple
description: Sets that a user can enter more than one value

name: muted
description: Sets that the audio output of the video should be muted

name: name_attribute
description: Sets the name of the element

name: novalidate
description: Sets that the form should not be validated when submitted

name: onabort
description: Script to be run on abort

name: onafterprint
description: Script to be run after the document is printed

name: onbeforeprint
description: Script to be run before the document is printed

name: onbeforeunload
description: Script to be run when the document is about to be unloaded

name: onblur
description: Script to be run when the element loses focus

name: oncanplay
description: Script to be run when a file is ready to start playing (when it has buffered enough to begin)

name: oncanplaythrough
description: Script to be run when a file can be played all the way to the end without pausing for buffering

name: onchange
description: Script to be run when the value of the element is changed

name: onclick
description: Script to be run when the element is being clicked

name: oncontextmenu
description: Script to be run when a context menu is triggered

name: oncopy
description: Script to be run when the content of the element is being copied

name: oncuechange
description: Script to be run when the cue changes in a track element

name: oncut
description: Script to be run when the content of the element is being cut

name: ondblclick
description: Script to be run when the element is being double-clicked

name: ondrag
description: Script to be run when the element is being dragged

name: ondragend
description: Script to be run at the end of a drag operation

name: ondragenter
description: Script to be run when an element has been dragged to a valid drop target

name: ondragleave
description: Script to be run when an element leaves a valid drop target

name: ondragover
description: Script to be run when an element is being dragged over a valid drop target

name: ondragstart
description: Script to be run at the start of a drag operation

name: ondrop
description: Script to be run when dragged element is being dropped

name: ondurationchange
description: Script to be run when the length of the media changes

name: onemptied
description: Script to be run when something bad happens and the file is suddenly unavailable (like unexpectedly disconnects)

name: onended
description: Script to be run when the media has reach the end (a useful event for messages like "thanks for listening")

name: onerror
description: Script to be run when an error occurs

name: onfocus
description: Script to be run when the element gets focus

name: onhashchange
description: Script to be run when there has been changes to the anchor part of the a URL

name: oninput
description: Script to be run when the element gets user input

name: oninvalid
description: Script to be run when the element is invalid

name: onkeydown
description: Script to be run when a user is pressing a key

name: onkeypress
description: Script to be run when a user presses a key

name: onkeyup
description: Script to be run when a user releases a key

name: onload
description: Script to be run when the element is finished loading

name: onloadeddata
description: Script to be run when media data is loaded

name: onloadedmetadata
description: Script to be run when meta data (like dimensions and duration) are loaded

name: onloadstart
description: Script to be run just as the file begins to load before anything is actually loaded

name: onmousedown
description: Script to be run when a mouse button is pressed down on an element

name: onmousemove
description: Script to be run as long as the mouse pointer is moving over an element

name: onmouseout
description: Script to be run when a mouse pointer moves out of an element

name: onmouseover
description: Script to be run when a mouse pointer moves over an element

name: onmouseup
description: Script to be run when a mouse button is released over an element

name: onmousewheel
description: Script to be run when a mouse wheel is being scrolled over an element

name: onoffline
description: Script to be run when the browser starts to work offline

name: ononline
description: Script to be run when the browser starts to work online

name: onpagehide
description: Script to be run when a user navigates away from a page

name: onpageshow
description: Script to be run when a user navigates to a page

name: onpaste
description: Script to be run when the user pastes some content in an element

name: onpause
description: Script to be run when the media is paused either by the user or programmatically

name: onplay
description: Script to be run when the media is ready to start playing

name: onplaying
description: Script to be run when the media actually has started playing.

name: onpopstate
description: Script to be run when the windows history changes.

name: onprogress
description: Script to be run when the browser is in the process of getting the media data

name: onratechange
description: Script to be run each time the playback rate changes (like when a user switches to a slow motion or fast forward mode).

name: onreset
description: Script to be run when a reset button in a form is clicked.

name: onresize
description: Script to be run when the browser window is being resized.

name: onscroll
description: Script to be run when an elements scrollbar is being scrolled

name: onsearch
description: Script to be run when the user writes something in a search field (for input="search")

name: onseeked
description: Script to be run when the seeking attribute is set to false indicating that seeking has ended

name: onseeking
description: Script to be run when the seeking attribute is set to true indicating that seeking is active

name: onselect
description: Script to be run when the element gets selected

name: onshow
description: Script to be run when a menu element is shown as a context menu

name: onstalled
description: Script to be run when the browser is unable to fetch the media data for whatever reason

name: onstorage
description: Script to be run when a Web Storage area is updated

name: onsubmit
description: Script to be run when a form is submitted

name: onsuspend
description: Script to be run when fetching the media data is stopped before it is completely loaded for whatever reason

name: ontimeupdate
description: Script to be run when the playing position has changed (like when the user fast forwards to a different point in the media)

name: ontoggle
description: Script to be run when the user opens or closes the details element

name: onunload
description: Script to be run when a page has unloaded (or the browser window has been closed)

name: onvolumechange
description: Script to be run each time the volume of a video/audio has been changed

name: onwaiting
description: Script to be run when the media has paused but is expected to resume (like when the media pauses to buffer more data)

name: onwheel
description: Script to be run when the mouse wheel rolls up or down over an element

name: open
description: Sets that the details should be visible (open) to the user

name: optimum
description: Sets what value is the optimal value for the gauge

name: pattern
description: Sets a regular expression that an input elements value is checked against

name: placeholder
description: Sets a short hint that describes the expected value of the element

name: poster
description: Sets an image to be shown while the video is downloading or until the user hits the play button

name: preload
description: Sets if and how the author thinks the audio/video should be loaded when the page loads

name: readonly
description: Sets that the element is read-only

name: rel
description: Sets the relationship between the current document and the linked document

name: required
description: Sets that the element must be filled out before submitting the form

name: reversed
description: Sets that the list order should be descending (9,8,7...)

name: rows
description: Sets the visible number of lines in a text area

name: rowspan
description: Sets the number of rows a table cell should span

name: sandbox
description: Enables an extra set of restrictions for the content in an iframe

name: scope
description: Sets whether a header cell is a header for a column row or group of columns or rows

name: scoped
description: Sets that the styles only apply to this elements parent element and that elements child elements

name: selected
description: Sets that an option should be pre-selected when the page loads

name: shape
description: Sets the shape of the area

name: size
description: Sets the width in characters (for input) or specifies the number of visible options (for select)

name: sizes
description: Sets the size of the linked resource

name: span
description: Sets the number of columns to span

name: spellcheck
description: Sets whether the element is to have its spelling and grammar checked or not

name: src
description: Sets the URL of the media file

name: srcdoc
description: Sets the HTML content of the page to show in the iframe

name: srclang
description: Sets the language of the track text data (required if kind="subtitles")

name: srcset
description: Sets the URL of the image to use in different situations

name: start
description: Sets the start value of an ordered list

name: step
description: Sets the legal number intervals for an input field

name: style
description: Sets an inline CSS style for an element

name: tabindex
description: Sets the tabbing order of an element

name: target
description: Sets the target for where to open the linked document or where to submit the form

name: title
description: Sets extra information about an element

name: translate
description: Sets whether the content of an element should be translated or not

name: type
description: Sets the type of element

name: usemap
description: Sets an image as a client-side image-map

name: value
description: Sets the value of the element

name: width
description: Sets the width of the element

name: wrap
description: Sets how the text in a text area is to be wrapped when submitted in a form
